text:
e="preserve">Mahadeepak Singh Shakya (25 July 1922 – 10 November 2020) was an Indian politician. He was a member of Lok Sabha for six terms from Etah in Uttar Pradesh from 1977 to 1998. He was a leader of Bharatiya Janata Party.
Shakya died on 10 November 2020 in Lucknow, India at the age of 98.
